page.title: 06LANDSCAPE CHANGES
page.content: There has been lots of {changes}in Aldingbourne since 1949.There were farms, woods, fields and the occasional farm house.Now Aldingbourne is just houses,roads and a few fields.One of the biggest changes is that some of{Aldingbourne rife}has been drained and a road and some houses have been built along it.Some of the woods are now gone.Some of the farms have gone or changed names.A {hospital}has been built next to what used to be Aldingbourne house at least there is still a few places that still exist, like Slindon park and Oldberry farm.There is still a public house near croker hill.And northfield farm still exsists which used to be near Eastergate lane,which is now the {A29.}We have found that there has been many changes in the past 30 years.
